content.detailedDescription: Just stepped outside my home which faces nearly due north. looked almost straight up and saw what might at first glance be a party balloon. the time was 9:32 pm so the night sky was quite dark with few clouds, almost none. the object appeared to be flat disc shaped, faintly yellow/light white, possibly transparent. the object was at least at cloud level or above and moved silently south-west. i could not guess the size or speed but we have many planes in the area and this object did not have the telltale blinking lights of an aircraft. if i could speak to perspective i would say holding my arm straight out with pink extended the object would have been at most the circumference of my pinky finger, flat disc shaped, like a round punch out using a 3 hole punch from a piece of paper. i quickly ran to my front door and called my wife out. she arrived seconds later to see the object recede into the distance until it was out of sight. as it moved away the object stayed bright in the sky like a star but eventually was too far away to track. the time from first observance to no longer visible was perhaps one to one and a half minutes. this time-frame would make it nearly impossible to be an aircraft for the speed it moved out of sight. a moment later my wife observed another object which i noted to be same in shape and coloration to the first, possibly higher, and moving more south than south-west. we observed it for perhaps 30 seconds to one minute until it was too far away to track. another moment or so in the same area where the first faded out of sight a single bright star like flash occurred which we both saw. we waited to see if this was a mere "twinkle" of a true star but there was not a star in the sky at that position. this light flash to me was blue/white. i kept looking nearly straight up hoping to see another disc object but while doing so my wife said she saw a second flash in the same area of the first, this second flash very blue and not white. there was sparse light clouds during the event with very little or no air traffic until after the event.
content.summary: Saw flat yellow/light white disc overhead moving sw over oakland park fl

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were looking at the stars and seen a fireball flying though the sky. another one right behind it. it came right over our house. we have never seen anything like this before and we see things all the time. it was reddish/orange (like a fireball),egg shaped,pulsated and was moving slow. looked like the cherry of a cig when someone takes a drag. we were shocked.I had enough time to take out my phone take 3 pictures and call my mom twice, so she could go outside and look. (since it was going in her direction).I was using my phone and the pictures didn't come out good. we lost sight when it went behind trees.
content.summary: Walking outside looking at stars and husband and i saw a fireball flying through sky with another right behind it.

content.detailedDescription: Teaveling south on 93 large set of lights movining eratically above the trees.  at burcham rd cemetary the craft was hovering abive the cemetary.  we stopped at the church  got out and looked at it it was probably a 70ft triangle hovering 90ft above the ground with lots of flashing lights and a hum buzzing sound to it.  it was so close it scared us so we left.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying triangle zig zag across sky stoped over cemetaty stoped got out watched it hover very close scared left  huge 70 ft triangle

content.detailedDescription: This is my 4th sighting in the same area in the last 3 yrs.  i was coming home from a hunting trip eastbound on 290 at 36 (brenham tx) i was looking for them. i had seen hovering pulsating orbs in pairs n 3s several times coming and goin to my ranch, comin from houston so ive been keeping an eye out. i saw 2 orbs, 1 close n bright, just south of the walmart, the other was lower, n further away, the 2nd was lower than the cl i se 1. i pulled into the lft turn lane and got my phone . i was too slow, by the time i got my camera up, the 1st orb pulsated n went superbright, then out. where the orb was, now howvered a black triangle w a light on each point. it moved effortlessly east to west, dirwxtly over me n gone. i was able to catch 3 images of the 2nd stationary one. i got my pics n traffic behind me made me move on. this was the 4th or 5th time i have seen them. oct 12 i saw 3 orbs , 1 flashed out n a triangle flew directly over my farmhouse, helicopter altitude but totally silent. i have seen them over the walmart in brenham 3 times b4.The 1st time i was in wonder, the 2nd 3rd n on i felt extereme curiosity and a drive to know what i was lookin at, no fear or negative feelings.
content.summary: I witnessed 2 orbs , got 3 pics of 1 of them.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend was on a early morning hike from dover to folkestone in kent, we took the country route up on the cliffs. when walking i looked up and whitnessed 7 orbs, brightly shining, they changed position and then froze again. as if they were pretending to be stars. the objects caught my attention because of their quick, 90 and 45 degree direction changes. they would freeze and then all move again. i first thought it could be satellites, but i've seen them in orbit before and they just move in one direction across the sky, not stop, reverse, then freeze and repeat. 7 orbs all at once, this made me ponder. the 7 objects were already on the move when i notice them, as i notice them they froze, which i thought was odd. i continued to observe, all 7 then move to different locations in the sky as a cluster then froze again and again, this repeated 3 times then they remained stationary for 5 minutes then they all disappeared. this incident clearly had an affect on me as i've remembered it all these years, i would like answers for it. i am mostly confused by what i witnessed that day as it looked un-human to me. i remain confused and would like answers. when the objects froze for the last time they remained there for 5 mins and then disappeared, just like a light had been switched off. me and my friend both witnessed this.
content.summary: 7 orbs directly overhead, hovering, changing directions.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in the yard looking west to ascertain if storms were headed our way. i observed a white cylinder shaped object approaching from the west. the object was smaller in the front and larger in the back sort of like a spy glass. it had a narrow black band in the middle and seemed to be spinning as it flew past. object wasn't that high up, maybe 6 or 7 hundred feet. there were no wings or tail on craft and it seemed to be pulled along as if on a string. the object just sort of appeared out of nowhere and disappeared in the same way while heading east. it made no sound and had no contrail. this is my fourth sighting of same said craft over our area. i get frustrated because i want to know what these things are. on two occasions i observed two of these craft, one right behind the other. three other people have told me that they have seen the same objects and i have urged them to report it. i'd like to add that these things seem to come out of nowhere and then disappear as if the sky swallows them up. i am 58 yrs old and have no reason to report something bogus to you folks. there are definitely some strange things flying over our state.
content.summary: White rotating cylinder craft passed over house

content.detailedDescription: I was in the house when my husband, who was outside looking for meteors, called me to come out. i went onto the front porch and saw one fireball moving across the sky. i knew this was not a metoer! the fireball moved slowly across the sky from north to south. it did not descend, just moved across the sky in the manner an airplane would do. as the first fireball moved farther away from us, a second one appeared. it came from the north and followed the same path as the first fireball. i ran into the nearby field and saw inside the first fireball was a chevron shaped vehicle with 3 tail-lights glowing blue, yellow and red. it seemed as if time was standing still for me, yet i was excited. the fireballs just kept moving in a south direction until they faded from view. we tried to take a photo, but the camera would not cooperate.
content.summary: Witnessed two fireball like objects, traveling one behind the other. the one farthest away became somewhat transparent and there appeared inside a chevron shaped vehicle with tail lights.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were driving north on our road and i looked in the sky and saw many lights dashing in and out of a raincloud. there looked to be more than two dozen. they were all the same sized white lights. it was far too high to be birds and they were moving far too quickly. the lights were all traveling in relatively the same direction. from northeast to northwest about 50 or 60 degrees up. we pulled over to watch them for about two minutes. they were dashing around in different directions however traveling as a group in one direction. as the large group disappeared behind the cloud completely we saw one more brighter than the rest zip across the entire horizon as if to catch up to the rest of the group.
content.summary: Saw many lights dashing in and out of a dark cloud.

content.detailedDescription: On the 5th of october  2013 at 12:11 pm i was having a coffee while looking out of my apartement window on the 8th floor to the horizon. suddenly i noticed a black object hovering about roughly 2 km to the south then moving slowly southeast then stopping and moving again ascending until it completely disappeared into the clouds above. to the naked eye the object appeared to have an oval shape. i watched the ufo the whole time between 12:11 pm and 12:20 pm. i grabbed my iphone and snapped about a dozen of pictures during that time. i managed to capture the object in few of the photos but needles to say that with this kind of camera it does not have the zoom option nor the best quality.  i have uploaded the pictures just to show the object path with the time of each frame. i would like to mention that in the area where i am located there is a high volume of air traffic at this time. the object did not have the same flying characteristics as a commercial jet or a helicopter.
content.summary: Black oval shape object

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were coming from columbus ga back into phenix city,al around 7:30 when all of the sudden i see what i thought was a star...I thought this was strange considering it wasn't dark yet and this object was so bright and glowed like a pinkish color..Suddenly it shot across the sky and stopped above what had to be a giant black boomerang object...I say that because i could clearly see the shape of it and see how dull the black was on it...By this time my 6 year old sees it as well and is freaking out along with me in total disbelief as to what we are witnessing....I watch it until i can get stopped in a grocery store parking lot...I call my husband and tell him to come where i am..By this time the entire parking lot is watching this object..My husband snaps a photo,but unfortunately it was too far away by that time.I have the picture but you can just barely make it out...After that we watched it until it went out of view ascending up out of view.My son was so scared he didn't want to sleep alone that night..It still freaks me out to think of what we all witnessed.
content.summary: Black boomerang shaped object spotted hovering in sky over town.I also saw a bright object that looked like a star before spotting this object..It flew toward the black object.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a cottage at lake erie in selkirk on and taking pictures of the lake because the setting sun turned the water a pretty pink and blue and it was very calm and peaceful. there was a couple in a rowboat adding to the serenity and picturesque view. it was either sept 18th or 19th and most cottages were empty as normal for this time of year. i did not see anything until i downloaded the photos onto my laptop to have some printed for my friend whos cottage i stayed at and because some were so beautiful put them on my desktop background. the bright white orb always caught my eye but at first i thought it was the moon and ignored it until 2 or 3 days later remembered there was a harvest moon that week and it was not at this spot in the sky until around midnight. in fact at this time in the evening i don't think the moon was visible to the se over the lake yet. then i thought it must be a star but it seemed to close and too large. i had put 3-4 photos on my computer background but then decided to eliminate all but 1 which ended up being this photo. that is when i had a good look and zoomed in. then it was clear this thing was behind the tree as leaves and branches are clearly in front of the orb. i have no idea what this object is and the closets thing it could be is a paper plate but there was no wind as you can see from the calmness of the lake. for sure it is not the moon and seems too large to be a star. a lot of planes are seen in this area over lake erie but this is not a plane, as it seems close er than a plane would come. when taking the pictures i did not see or hear anything unusual perhaps because i was so focused on the beauty of the lake and taking the pictures. it is bothering me not knowing what this object is and a couple of friends say it could only be the moon which of course it is not. if i had just printed the photo this thing would have been missed for sure. when i zoom in too much it distorts the object. i have 2 other photos taken at the same time and one shows a flock of geese with a shadow that appears to be a plane coming towards the camera but in the next shot the geese are further west and there is a bright light just above the lake to the west that was not in the other 2 photos. the photo with the orb also has a shadowy disklike shape to the left side half way up and in a bit. it is on an angle that to me a plane would not make and would like to know your opinion on that as well. it seems too large to be a loon diving into the water, but the loons are coming back to the area.  this bright white orb behind the tree is very strange though. i hope that you can contact me about what this object may be as i completed the form as best i could but not having only seen it in the photo makes it no so accurate. thank you.
content.summary: I did not see this object until after downloading photos i put 3 or 4 onto my desktop background

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog at 10pm , stopped to cross road, looked to my right to see if any traffic was coming then noticed it in the sky coming over a building very big and low. i just stood and watched as it came towards me, it stopped above my head it was completely silent. as was everything else around me, i was stunned it was like an egg shape on its side, i did notice what looked like 3 very dim lights in centre underneath, i remember red yellow but can't b sure of 3 rd colour . i did notice 2 loofed panels flush with body of ship. it began moving again very slow away from me in front of me. at this time i remember looking down at my dog as she hadn't pulled on her lead at all and she was looking up at it too. i looked quickly around for anyone just to shout look but no one was around at all. i walked across the rd as far as i could as train lines and marshes prevented me going further, i watched to it was completely out of sight. then ran home and phoned everyone .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Came from righ side behind me, slowly, stopped above my head for some time, continued in front of me slowly away

content.detailedDescription: Huge transparent except for the outer edges pulsating movement and 3  light blue lights.  front was triangle shaped with the blue light right in middle and on the left and right side was a  blue light and then the back on as far as i could see couldn't see just a huge rectangle shaped body with no end that i could see.  seemed very very low to the ground and i could see clouds, stars and stuff through it.
content.summary: Extremly large transparent craft, could only see the outline, stars, etc on the inside.  very low to the ground couldn't see the end.  slowly moved as if pulsating.  we talked about it for a couple hours then it was sort of unimportant??? . of "forgotten"

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch at the top of a hill in woburn ma, it was cold i remember i was just finishing smoking a cigarette when i looked up and saw what appeared to be a massive flying craft, rectangular in shape. it was approximately 400 meters across and about 100 meters wide, it was huge! i saw two circular lights rotating (like turbines) and pulsating different colors as it hovered overhead. it made its was to the left of the property over a graveyard to the left of my apartment house in the matter of seconds and faster than anything ive ever seen before and since. it stayed there for less than a second before darting off in the distance towards what appeared to be a radio station with two bright lights being emitted from towers in that direction. i cant explain what i saw...I dont believe it to be a conventional aircraft...
content.summary: It was like a skateboard with lights, definitely not human!!!!

content.detailedDescription: in sightings report flyings object
content.summary: Alien loster

content.detailedDescription: We where on the freeway  it was a clear afternoon the sun  except for one cloud looking thing in the sky it had not moved for a few miles so we pulled over and started o record it we noticed it was a small sphere with huged flames two of them it was not miving it was still it had a red light that was blinking really fast the flames had no smoke trail as i was recording it just started to fade away it was the most amazing thing i have ever witness and to have it on a hd sony camcorder it looks awesome and give me chills wen i stop recording my girlfriend ,daughter ,and nice where in the car also  her sister was a few miles behind us and also witness the flames from there car . i think u guys really need to see this video
content.summary: A. sphere with flames then it vanishes on tape  looks good

content.detailedDescription: My fiancee and i were out on our deck at our residence, having a smoke, talking about our work days, and out of the corner of my fiancee's eye, over the roof, a round, glowing orange object, making no sound whatsoever, moving slowly, appeared and she yelled for me to turn around. i saw the object as it was descending and we both ran to the railing astonished, as this was the exact same object we had seen in the area two years before (we filed a report then too in the same area and we had 2 other witnesses to that sighting... ) i had my phone with me and hit the zoom and snapped a picture of the object as it was descending behind the tree line over our neighbor's house. the picture sucks, showing only a pinprick of orange light, but that's not what it looked like to the naked eye, but while i was intent on focusing the camera, my fiancee saw a small white round glowing object drop out of the bottom of the orange sphere and then it descended low enough to be obscured by the trees.  it was 9:00 pm est when we first saw it, the camera phone shot will have the time and date stamped on it and we will upload it for what it's worth.  at exactly 9:20 pm est, the object reappeared above the same tree and and it was smaller, and looked much farther away then during our first sighting.  we ran out into the front yard, hoping for a less obscured viewing but the trees that line our street prevented us from even seeing it amidst the branches.  we both tried to guestimate how large it was, using the plane that was passing by, higher and over the object by about 4 inches in the sky (we live by lunken airport and are familiar with planes landing and taking off) and since we aren't experts or pilots, have no frame of reference to judge exactly how high it was in the sky. the plane was a few millimeters long, with the usual flashing beacon light and it was probably on it's way away, and the plane had taken off from lunken as it was ascending and silent and this object was a golf ball size in comparison... and the plane was silent, and the object was too and it dwarfed the size of the plane so we're not sure how high either one was since there was no sound.  we had a sighting like this, exactly like this unidentified glowing orange sphere, but that object we saw and reported, split into two smaller orange spheres but this one did not... so we are basically speechless that we are seeing the same exact thing once again, without the splitting, at about the same time of year from 2 years ago.  since we saw the first one two years ago, we were careful to at least get the exact time and we are hoping that anyone else in the area who saw the same thing will report. i called my fiancee's mom who lives only a few miles away so she could run out and look up in the sky to see if she saw it, but she did not see it (her neighborhood is hilly and older with lots of trees as well) we have run through all the possibilities of what conventional or explainable object could appear and hover, then keep moving but we still, like the first sighting, cannot think of what it could be. it was not flares, it was not a hot air balloon, it is not a night-time blimp, and we don't think it was a remote-controlled device due to it's size and the way it moved. it was too slow to be any of those we are guessing and obviously we ruled out meteorite, because we have seen videos of those etc. if it's possible to file a foa request at lunken airport for the radar tower asap, we would highly recommend you do so if at all possible, since we know your office is there and that would be awesome! i stopped in to chat one day and i remember how you told me that you have to be quick in doing the foa filing, so that is why i am reporting it directly after the event.  i am dying to know what this is and if there is a logical explanation i would love to know! if you would call me, and tell me how to file for the foa file from the radar tower, i will do the leg work just to satisfy my curiosity!!! please don't hold the photo against this report, it's truly terrible, we know that!!  we scoff at similar photos but it's all we have!  thanks for all you do mufon!
content.summary: Glowing orange perfectly round slow moving, hovered, moved again

content.detailedDescription: My father and i had just spent a week in lost river,w.V. this picture was taken as he just shot the valley after a great sunset. he never saw the objects until being back in new jersey after we came back and put them on the computer.If you look in the upper left of the picture there are some strange  objects. i just want people to look at this and let me know what you think this may be.
content.summary: Picture taken in lost river,w.V   8/26/2013

content.detailedDescription: I am a new member for three weeks now...And i wanted to make a report.  dallas,tx 10/4/13 @ 7:15pm..... i was outside with the neighborhood kids, sky conditions were clear blue skies with a very small amount of clouds. now what i noticed is a few chemtrail clouds then what caught my eyes was a bright orb like movement. what i thought to be a plane with a bright sun reflection turned out to not be. as i watched it disperse a few trails a small bit at a time in the straight down direction. then started moving in a straight away direction right before it faded away from sight. right out of the first bit of dispersment came out another brightly lit orb headed straight down. this one did not disperse anything. then once again right before i lost view of it behind a tree a third started moving upward then crossing right over the sky. at the same time as this happening ...The kids pointed out an actual plane like object coming sideways clearly dispersing chems all the way across. now to clarify what i was seeing wasnt a eye trick...Other actual airplanes were starting to cross the areas. which the kids were able to clearly see the difference between the objects. to make it even weirder we saw one object that clearly had no wings but maneuvered just like a plane come across last. now to get more evidence i tried recording it with my camera phone which records in hd 1080p but the objects did not appear on camera but the planes did. this all happened between 7:15-7:21pm in north dallas. i would love to discuss more if u like. 214-283-7113.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I am a new member for three weeks now...And i wanted to make a report.  dallas,tx 10/4/13 @ 7:15pm..... i was outside with the neighborhood kids, sky conditions were clear blue skies with a very small amount of clouds. now what i noticed is a few chemtrai

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for a friend to pick us up for a basketball game. it was dark, i and a friend were standing at the end of his driveway. i had to go bathroom ,so i'm standing next to the mailbox taking a leak, when a 40 ft. circle lit up around us. i looked at my friend louie and he was looking straight up in the sky. i looked up and saw an egg shaped light. there was no sound, and there was no beam of light coming down from this light. the thing in the sky was lit up and the ground around us was lit. i don't know how long this went on, but i don't think it was too long. the light on the ground suddenly went out, and the light in the sky sat motionless, then it slowly moved away with no sound. our friend picked us up and took us to the game. the school was in st. francis, mn. before we could tell our story, everybody was talking about a ufo that had flown over cedar, a small town southwest of our sighting. i'm now 63 years old, and have no reason to lie about this event. i think about this sighting at least once a week. it was just so strange.
content.summary: Ufo spotted at night

content.detailedDescription: I am adding more photos to this same case i had reported on october 3, 2013 when i go outside and take pictures i make sure am looking around to see if i see anything in the sky. most of the time i don't see anything .Then they show up on my camera after uploading to my iphoto on my mac computer. the sky has been super clear and blue with no planes around. lately, i have been going outside after 8:00 am then going back out around 10:00am i then go back out for the last time after 7:00pm just as the sun is setting. i mostly see objects late at night and have captured hours of video footage of unexplained objects that cannot be explained and that i have not yet found on the internet of what i have been seeing. when i first noticed i had captured daytime footage i was so surprised. i never caught anything on my photos of the daytime. i was a little scared but, very curious to keep going back out and taking more pictures. but, now i have noticed they appear in the same general areas and i am thinking they could be the same ones one of the objects look either as a triangle/heart shape. when another one would be just a solid oval/round shape but, could be dull or very bright. most are all solid white. mostly they all have been a solid white. this is a first to see such objects on my photos. usually, i capture them on video. these objects i have been seeing have no sound. it's kind of unnerving to know maybe something could be watching me. thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.shape: Boomerang,   Circle,   Oval,   Sphere,   Teardrop,   Triangle
content.summary: Looking at the photos i had just taken in my yard in the day and evening i noticed solid white glowing roundish objects. most were white.

content.detailedDescription: Sunday evening, october 29, 2013 at about 7:40 pm i came up to the third floor bedroom where i sleep.  this bedroom has a five foot wide window that offers an excellent view of the lower land and the night sky.  most nights i sleep with the curtains opened so i can see the sky.  i planned to read before i slept. a minute or two later while arranging my pillows so i could read, i saw a light just above the horizon.  the sky was solid dark gray clouds.  beneath, the trees in back of my house formed a corridor to the visible horizon. i thought the light was a star.  i remembered i hadn't made a wish on a star for many years so i quoted the childhood twinkle, twinkle little star, etc. and made a wish. after a few moments of observing the tiny light i realized it was moving toward me.  at first, i thought it was a small airplane then as the light grew larger i thought it was a helicopter.  as it got closer i realized it was not an aircraft.  it was a ufo and unlike anything i had seen before.  i was mesmerized and delighted to see it.  it continued in a straight line until it was halfway between me and the horizon. before me was a yellow and gold glowing sphere around whose edges was what appeared to be a shifting transparent energy field of red and blue.  there was a gentle, comfortable energy that i could feel and i was at peace and happy.  it was like meeting a friend one hadn't seen in a long time.  the path of the ufo was upward from a horizon considerably lower than the top of the hill where i live.  it came straight toward my house.  it got more brilliant in light/energy.  it began to ascend and came nearer and nearer.  i had a feeling that its path was intentional and not willy nilly nor unplanned.  at one point i felt that i was somehow part of it.  it was getting so close i couldn't believe it.  i thought happily to myself, "it's going to go right over the house!"  wrong.  no sooner did i think that than it veered sharply to its right - my left - and behind treetops disappearing entirely at the edge of my window.  i felt sadness temporarily and then gratitude that i had see the ufo. the event lasted about ten minutes.
content.summary: Ufo moved directly toward me from horizon and quickly veered to my left and disappeared behind trees

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photographs of some beautiful clouds and captured what appears to be a plasma type craft.  i didn't see it until the photo was downloaded. you can see it in the lower right of the photograph.
content.summary: Captured image and saw after downloaded.

content.detailedDescription: I was seating looking up into the clouds from my balcony. the thick grey outer bands clouds associated with tropical storm karen cover the whole sky. i was looking at a small airplane flying under cloud ceiling and with small blinking red and white light in what appeared to be an approach course from the south toward the miami international airport. i notice this very bright sphere of light just bigger that an aspirin but smaller that a penny as it broke the cloud ceiling to the left of the airplane but not close to it. right away i felt it was a ufo, i have previous military training to identified aircrafts. the object broke the cloud ceiling in a 20 degree angle, corrected to 45 for lest than a second and change to 20 again to go into the clouds. reappear again doing a similar maneuver to go back in to the clouds. i got up right away and looked to see if i could see it further down in the direction that was heading but it did not appear again. only the small airplane that i observe before could be seen. the speed was fast, faster that the airplane but not blinding fast. i felt that either the object broke cloud cover by mistake or in purpose since it did the same maneuver twice. my wife got home just minutes after, i told her what i just saw. she described my face as surprise and awe. i lost sight as the object went into cloud cover the second time.
content.summary: Object broke cloud ceiling, change direction in to clouds and again broke cloud ceiling and in to clouds.

content.detailedDescription: This happened 2 days in a row between 11:30 and 12:00 the october 2nd and 3rd. i never sighted anything but it made a high pitched squeal varying in pitch and noise level. it was high pitched enough to almost hurt the ears. my son and i rushed outside but could not see anything. the 2 dogs i have jumped off the couch and rubbed their ears on the carpet.
content.summary: Did not see cloudy

content.detailedDescription: On 9/24/13 and about 9:30 pm, i was driving on highway 101 south, chehalis washington, on a rainy and foggy night when i saw a big circular red orange object flying sideways over a mountain, and bright everything like a sunshine on a summer time for just seconds, i keep driving on the highway and try to see if we can see more but we couldn't because everything turns more dark and the weather gets worse, but barely we saw the red orange clouds covering the big circular bright red orange object.
content.summary: Black, red orange circular shape

content.detailedDescription:
On october 4th 2013 i, again sighted an unknown object above my house in the village of oak creek at approximately 06:00am. this time the craft was boomerang shaped with short light trails off opposite sides which suggest the craft was moving up and down while hovering. i was only able to get two photos of the object. 

therefore, from now on since i am seeing more and more of these objects on a daily basis i will try to film them on my digital 8 sony w/ 700 zoom lens at power x20. the reason being is that on two of the last three occasions i have taken photos of the three different craft with my droid cell phone and am unable to down load the photos onto my computer or this computer report.
content.summary: I don't know why i am able to see so many ufo's lately but its happening again in the voc of sedona az

content.detailedDescription: Hampton nh 9:15 pm 10/03/13: i was on the back porch having a cigar smoke, sitting in the lawn chair. looking into the clear sky, i saw a shooting star, which appeared to be a normal event. as i sat there for a few more minutes looking in the same general area, i saw what appeared to be another shooting star, a small star like white object, fly into the same area - but this was different... although it was moving quickly, it came into view, from north to south, turned abruptly, zipped back and forth and then sped off in the same initial general direction, southward. it was fast but not as fast as a typical meteor event. the viewing lasted probably five seconds +/-, enough time for for me to say "what the hell is that!" jump to my feet and watch it disappear over the tree line. i have watched the skies my entire life and i have seen many, many meteor events including bolides - but this has me stumped. meteors, and conventional aircraft do not move like this did.
content.summary: Saw what looked like shooting star quickly change direction several times and it sped away

content.detailedDescription: Went out side to take a piss sky was clear . my door opens to the north and shining in the sky was what i first thought to be a airplane cause i heard airplane noise but then i spotted the airplane and it went quickly out of view ,so next i thought it was a sat lite so i lined my self up with a tree to give my self a perspective on how fast and witch way it was moving , it does not seem to move per say it kind of makes you think of movement the way it pulses and changes shape but it staid in same place for half hour . i thought i saw something fly up to meet it and got creeped out now im inside.My roomate just got up for water i took him out side he spotted on exactly the same elevation due south  the one to the south started spinning in small circles the one to the north dropped down to 15 degrees then accended back to 30 degrees . we are creeped out and locking the door.
content.summary: Large pulsing iragular shaped

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten off work in springboro and was walking out to my car and just happened to look at the sky and seen what looked like 4 falling orang/gold meteors in a cluster with a little tail behind them falling toward the horizon. i looked at them for a few seconds and they dissapeared and then 4 pretty bright white star looking things appeared in the same spot. they didn't move much at first but then started moving randomly around for about 15 seconds then went back to looking like they did before when they were falling and then again back to the star like things. they went into the tree line and i couldn't see them anymore. the same thing happened to me about a month earlier but i didn't think much of it until i seen the exact same thing in the same area which is what i described above. i looked it up to try to find out what it was and i found a similar thing happened to someone in lebanon and springboro the day after i seen it myself.
content.summary: Failing and moving lights
